tweet: Thank you Jesus for not only having mercy on us but for also persuing and really really wanting us. #jesustweeters
My soul finds rest in God alone: My salvation comes from Him.  Psalms 62:1  #jesustweeters
LORD let me reflect your love, your peace, your glory ... simply all that you are!! #jesustweeters
More love, more power, more of you in my life! #jesustweeters
A cheerful heart is good medicine, but a crushed spirit dries up the bones. (Proverbs 17:22) #jesustweeters
